channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: October 30, 2024 Today's Verse Galatians 1:10 [10] For am I now seeking the approval of man, or of God? Or am I trying to please man? If I were still trying to please man, I would not be a servant of Christ. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.
